text: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj is a British-Indian animated television series that is created by Josh Gershowitz , it is produced by Reliance Animation , Viacom18 , and Nickelodeon International . The show starts off with a pair of cousins named Sammy and Raj , And they go on adventures in time to pause , rewind , slow motion of fast forward of anything that is happening in the past , present and future . Category:Indian animated television series
title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy & Raj
